column2: 2: Bleeding requiring surgical or therapeutic bronchoscopic intervention
4: Bowel obstruction or ileus not requiring surgical intervention
8: Bowel obstruction or ileus requiring surgical intervention
16: Bronchial Stenosis/Stricture not requiring surgical or therapeutic bronchoscopic intervention
32: Bronchial Stenosis/Stricture requiring surgical or therapeutic bronchoscopic intervention
64: Bronchopleural Fistula requiring surgical or therapeutic bronchoscopic intervention
4096: Loculated pleural effusion requiring surgical intervention
8192: Pericardial tamponade or pericarditis requiring surgical intervention
131072: Placement of Additional Thoracostomy Tube(s), Specify Indication
2097152: Pulmonary Vein or Left Atrial Thrombosis
